What are the treatments for autosomal dominant nocturnal frontal lobe epilepsy ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of ADNFLE:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Autosomal Dominant Nocturnal Frontal Lobe Epilepsy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Epilepsy, nocturnal frontal lobe, type 1  - Genetic Testing Registry: Epilepsy, nocturnal frontal lobe, type 2  - Genetic
